name: aerisi-kalinoth-pota
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of aerisi-kalinoth-pota, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of aerisi-kalinoth-pota with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Imagine a heroic fantasy scene rooted in medieval-fantasy materials, with no sign of modern technology. Draw the characters with culturally coherent gear, rendered in a consistent, painterly style. One of the central figures should be a creature with unique musculature and limbs for an underwater environment. Add a human figure for size comparison. Use a three-color palette mainly of teals, deep blues, and sea-greens, with highlights in pearl. The setting is an underwater-sky merged zone, showing both elements of aquatic life and celestial bodies. A sense of movement should permeate the scene, giving it the energy of a sweeping epic tale. Accessories, like armor and weapons, should reflect the aquatic theme, looking as though they were forged in the sea, perhaps featuring elements reminiscent of pressure-dome materials. Infuse the scene with hints of fantasy realism demonstrating underwater lighting through subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Avoid any embedded text, anachronistic elements like modern signage, or sci-fi UIs. Refrain from using styles corresponding to photoreal CGI or anime, and avoid glare effects that might dilute the painterly style.
